attributes.action: Life in prison for all child sex abuse offences no matter how serious
attributes.additional_details: No child that can't defend themselves against an adult should ever see there abuser on the streets again. It must be the most distressing and painful assault of its kind to be sexually assaulted or raped as a child. An offence of its kind will stay with a person for the rest of there life and having the abuser jailed for life will bring more comfort and a better chance of mentally recovering as well as making sure the abuser doesn't get chance to abuse another child.
attributes.background: Change the law on child sex or sexual abuse offences so offenders are jailed for life. No matter the level of seriousness any offences of child sex abuse will result in life in prison.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304563
